definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart

sentences.english: The cross location is the uppermost location mode for the ship-borne microwave OTH radar.
sentences.chinese: 交叉定位是艦載微波超視距雷達最主要的定位方式。

sentences.english: The result, of the angular super- resolution for the HF OTH radar are given.
sentences.chinese: 給出了地波超視距雷達中角度超分辨的某些結果。

sentences.english: Within the past 10 years China also has developed and deployed an over-the-horizon radar.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的10年裏，中國發展部署了一個超視距雷達。

sentences.english: The choice of airborne landing point is one of the key works in over-the-horizon vertical landing action.
sentences.chinese: 機降場選擇是超視距垂直登陸作戰的關鍵工作之一。

sentences.english: Furthermore, meteor trails scattering can affect the performance of a beyond-light-of-sight radar system.
sentences.chinese: 最後研究了流星餘跡散射對超視距雷達性能的影響。

sentences.english: An image processing system for Low-Light-Level TV is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了一些改進微光成像系統視距性能的途徑。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
to whisper to one another's ear
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
